title: preview of picture files doesn't work if the file name starts with a number (2012 etc.)
body:
i have this very strange bug if a picture file starts with a number then i can not preview it, getting this message:

"the requested content cannot be loaded.
please try again later."

regardless of os or browser ( or different combinations) i experienced the same problem, windows 7, ubuntu linux, ie, chrome,firefox doesn't make any difference...

original file name is 2011-09-22_11-47-36_712.jpg and say if i change the file name to p2011-09-22_11-47-36_712.jpg then preview works as expected,

owncloud is running on a (its own machine,dedicated) vmware machine with 4 gb memory and data folder (/home/owncloud-data)  is on nexenta san server (iscsi) and we are using centos 6 64 bit. php version is "php version 5.5.0rc3" and apache apache/2.2.15 (centos). we are using mysql 

client api library version	mysqlnd 5.0.11-dev - 20120503 - $id: 40933630edef551dfaca71298a83fad8d03d62d4 $

i first started testing owncloud with version 5(5.0.6 and 5.0.7) and i experienced this very same problem which i wasn't able solve.

i switched to 4.5.12 and i started seeing the same problem and after some testing i figured it was something to do with file name since i was able to preview other files without any problem.

i upgraded to 4.5.13 and still have the same problem.


thanks,

sam
